Reviews.Title: I love my laptop
Reviews.Author: Angela J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I got this laptop 3 weeks ago and couldn't be happier with it.  It's not for people who like to play those very graphically intense games, but I've never played them and probably never will.  But it is great for almost everyone else.It took less than 15 minutes to open the box and get on the internet.  I watch Netflix movies with no problems.  I knew the Satellite L655 was energy efficient but I was surprised that it barely gets warm after using it all day long, no need for a cooling pad.  The fan rarely runs.There is the one big box store that adds lots of useless software then charges around $100 to remove it.  This configuration from Amazon didn't come with any not needed junk pre-installed.

Reviews.Title: Even better then expected
Reviews.Author: RickR
Reviews.Content: I have owned the 5158 about a month now and am quite pleased with the purchase. I did quite a bit of research before I bought it and for under $500 there was only 1 other laptop out there with comparable specs and it cost a few dollars more and was an Acer. This is my 2nd Toshiba on my 1st the technology got old the puter still runs fine just too slow by todays standards and not worth the cost to upgrade. I am using this to replace my business desktop though and it has been on 24/7 for the last month with no problems. I did add a (BELKIN) powered USB hub and a Cooler Master 3 fan laptop stand and every now and then check the PC health monitor and it run around 50% in both PC fan speed and PC operating temperatures with the additional cooling. I have turned the fans off just to check and on 24/7 it runs a bit hot without them. So I highly suggest the stand if you use your puter for extended periods of time.I also had a couple minor OS system glitches the 1st couple days setting it up and called toshiba for help. I was pleasantly surprised when hold time was non existent and they where even helpful, a major plus if you ever dealt with Gateway or Acer.I could go on but the bottom line is I would feel comfortable telling my best friend to buy this laptop.It's been about 9 months and still running 24/7 with no problems. I did increase the RAM to 8GB and add a W/D My Book Studio II for additional storage and back-up and by the way I highly suggest the W/D external if you have critical data you can't afford to loose it backs up every 2 minutes onto 2 drives automatically . I have nothing but great things to say right now runs like a champ and with the extra RAM is as fast as I need and can have an extremely large amount of operations running with no problems. About the only problems I ever run into have more to do with glitches associated with Windows7 not the Toshiba.Bottom line is I would still feel very comfortable telling my best friend to buy this laptop. In fact I'm buying a 2nd one of these in May if their still available. If not I'll purchase another Toshiba with no hesitation to give to my son to take to college this summer.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Delphia Curran
Reviews.Content: I have had the laptop for about a month now and am quite happy with it.  So far, no problems at all.  This is my first laptop so I wasn't sure what to expect, but enjoy the portability of it.  Couldn't get used to the touch pad, though, and had to get a mouse, but that is personal preference. The battery lasts about 3 hours or so before needing a recharge.  I don't know if that's bad or not, but hasn't been a problem so far.

Reviews.Title: initial problem
Reviews.Author: Delbert A. Mcguire
Reviews.Content: Shipping was good.  Price was good.  Initial computer was bad.  It had a problem with the desktop and toolbar disappearing.  It could be temporarily fixed by removing and reinstalling explorer.  Amazon replaced the original and there have been no problems with the replacement.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellites are horrible
Reviews.Author: Patrick O'Malley "617patrick"

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html/ref=cm_ciu_vr_mo19ZARQG7EWZ4N/177-8699218-0092836?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo19ZARQG7EWZ4NcurrentClick) { return cv_mo19ZARQG7EWZ4NcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:48 MinsMultiple problems, had it less than 6 month, had to send it back for 2 weeks, told them not to delete my data and they did anyway, and then returned a broken laptop, which you can hear in the video at [...]The video is the sound AFTER it was return. Horrible product, horrible customer service, worst company I have ever dealt with.

Reviews.Title: Just the laptop that i was looking for
Reviews.Author: Vianey Molina
Reviews.Content: The size I wanted, a big hard disk, with numeric keypad, good battery duration. While video card is simple, the combination of price and performance is excellent.For this price you get a great product, I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Laptop exceeds all my expectations
Reviews.Author: Adela C. Garcia
Reviews.Content: I have yet to find something I do not like about this laptop.  It is portable, small enough to use in just about any location.  Its appearance is sleek and the keys are all large enough to type on rapidly, even though it is a very compact laptop.I would recommend it for both people who use their laptops for merely reading e-mail and general Microsoft OFfice applications, and equally for those who will use it for much more complex tasks.

Reviews.Title: Great value for price
Reviews.Author: aliyyah27
Reviews.Content: The price for what you get in this laptop is great. It was shipped and delivered within 3 days of my ordering it. Easy to set up, no glitches thus far. This system is light and stylish and does everything I need it to do for my personal and business use. Great laptop for a professional and a student.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite L655-S5158 15.6-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Calico Smith
Reviews.Content: Nice computer. I'm replacing an older Toshiba laptop I had. We buy Toshiba laptops in our family as they are great machines for the money.I use this machine for internet surfing. It boots up quickly compared to old machine.The screen is shorter then the other 15 inch laptop I had, but is large enough for me to do what I want to do.I've not had any delays in video streaming at all.The HDMI port is nice, but I have not used it as of yet.I would certainly buy another one of these machines.I turned off the tap feature on the touch pad as things opened up accidenly more then I liked.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: RFL
Reviews.Content: I love mine, not a single problem with it.This is my second Toshiba laptop, the previous one is still working but is too old.

Reviews.Title: Great product! At first...
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: This laptop worked perfectly! I used it often with no problems. But then within 30 days it started seeing problems. It ran slowly, it would freeze up, it would shut down every 20 minutes and tell me my "PC encountered a problem". I stopped using it until it could be fixed. It worked nicely again but after a few days it started doing it again. Everything shows that it's working and there are no problems or any virus to be found, but for some reason the laptop just doesn't want to run correctly. Needless to say I'm returning this oversized paperweight as soon as I can and finding a laptop that will actually work! I've had it since January 2013 and it just doesn't want to work no matter what.

Reviews.Title: Still working
Reviews.Author: Aeryn
Reviews.Content: I purchased this in 2011 and I've had no problems. I did a lot of research, including a friend who had one that I could touch, and compared with other similar computers. It has everything I need to search the internet and Skype, two of the big things I need a computer for. At the time I purchased this computer, I didn't know anything about streaming videos. I do now and this computer is excellent at that! I have no complaints. It has paid for itself several time over.

Reviews.Title: Our granddaughter loves it (17 year old)
Reviews.Author: Warren Heeder
Reviews.Content: We use Toshiba computers at home all the time and love them. So, when our granddaughter needed a computer we, highly recommended this one.

Reviews.Title: warning to all who buy this line of product this user
Reviews.Author: H.Lindquist
Reviews.Content: this laptop isn't in anyway shape or form what i ordered its not the same model not the same color half the keys are broken and a big peace of the key bored is broken off it doesn't even run properly. my experience with this product was very unsatisfying and frustrating im extreamly unsatisfied with this transaction and want a refund as for who i would recoment this product for the answer is no one . and thats why i chose the rating i did

Reviews.Title: Cheap, nothing more
Reviews.Author: Byron
Reviews.Content: Buena laptop hasta que tuve problemas con el disco duro y tuve que remplazarlo con uno nuevo y eso me genero mas gastos de lo que tenia presupuestado ademas el ventilador suena mucho.

Reviews.Title: Chief Pilot and owner
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Bowman owner and commercial pilot
Reviews.Content: Very pleased works perfect. I chose Plantronics because I had used similiar products in my airplane with excellent results as long as I had my Comanche

Reviews.Title: great computer
Reviews.Author: Shannon Hadfield
Reviews.Content: i use it often i have seem to be blog down with extra garage that is not needed so i have try to get ride of them other than that a good computer

Reviews.Title: Hard drive failure
Reviews.Author: Indy Linda
Reviews.Content: I thought it was a great laptop and had no complaints until the hard drive failed after just 18 months of use.

Reviews.Title: Short Life
Reviews.Author: STAR
Reviews.Content: I purchased this computer in May of 2011 and now the hard drive has crashed. It didn't even last 2 years. I looked at some of the other reviews and others have had the same problem after about 12 to 18 months...Great price but not worth it in the end....It crashes just when you need it most..I don't even use it much....what a waste of money

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: rosy
Reviews.Content: a computer, very durable, was with me a long time and was very effective in the operations that I was doing ... damage was only once and was the strip of the screen but it was much use .. very good. recommended

Reviews.Title: hard drive
Reviews.Author: boolittlek
Reviews.Content: I really liked it until the hard drive started failing almost a year after purchase (constant hard drive alert messages and very slow performance).  I bought it after my Dell desktop and laptop had failed within a few months of each other.  Not wanting to get burned again, I also bought a SquareTrade warranty.  My claim has been approved, so I should be getting a repair or refund soon.

Reviews.Title: Hard drive failure
Reviews.Author: D. Sanderson
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my daughter and after about year the hard drive began failing, giving Windows messages about a corruption.  Yet, we can't figure out how to fix it.

Reviews.Title: Incredible for the price!
Reviews.Author: Hackensack76
Reviews.Content: I couldn't possibly expect more from a laptop at this price.  I've been using it for a year, and no problems so far.  The quality is great, it's quick, and has lots of storage.  Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Good performance
Reviews.Author: hephzi_bah
Reviews.Content: The best laptop that we have at our  (we have 10) and its own assembly is better than our ACER, HP, DELL, on the model too....Albert

Reviews.Title: Good buy, I guess
Reviews.Author: Bala
Reviews.Content: A friend of mine ordered it from my account. So far he has no complains do I guess it is really good.

Reviews.Title: Great choise
Reviews.Author: Constantin
Reviews.Content: Simply great quality... It's been more Than a year since I bought it and it's still seems like new, even the battery works 3-4 hours.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Laptop
Reviews.Author: Jocelyn N. Oneil "Jo-c Babez"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS LABTOP!! Ive had it for almost 8 months now and had no problems whatsoever its great! Ive had alot of problems with my dell laptop and its so nice, to not have to worry about problems

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for the price!
Reviews.Author: Active Media
Reviews.Content: My wife wanted her own laptop for lite personal and work use. This has everyting she could ever need. It is fast,has Intel i3 processor and a 15.6 screen. Toshiba is among best rated for laptop reliability. At the price and using reward points, it was a no brainer. My wife has best computer in the family and she stays off mine. prices must be dropping on laptops because everyone seems to want tablets. For this value, I'll stay "old school"

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: blah
Reviews.Content: I am not a very demanding PC user since I mostly use my PC for very basic applications which could be probably done pretty well on the old pentium 1 or something, however I think for users like me ( and there are plenty), this model gives a great value for price. It's fast, has full keyboard, supports most of the wi-fi protocols and has about 6 hrs of battery life . I generally can't find anything bad to say about it except the fact that it is a little bit heavy, but that's the price you pay for 15.6-inch screen you want.

Reviews.Title: A powerful machine!
Reviews.Author: batman99
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop! It is fast, has lots of memory, is durable, and I can do all my online games with it. I do a lot of stuff on the computer at once, and it can handle it. Intel i3 is fast. The only thing that I would not give a 5 star on is the CD player. It is a little slow on loading CDs, and it makes odd noises when playing them. It takes around 10-15 seconds to load a medium size CD. It is not a big deal for me. I would suggest this laptop to any person!

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Omar Reyes Hernandez "oarh"
Reviews.Content: i use this laptop at home and so far it has been working as expected, im not a gamer... but i've seen some movies an image quality is terrific... i recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Maximiliano
Reviews.Author: Maximiliano
Reviews.Content: Excellent computer arrived in perfect condition in its original packaging, all the functions described in full operation, a team of good size in terms of quality for the job in the office, at home or on trips to deacargar family photos or perform work fast. I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: toshiba laptop
Reviews.Author: LaVerne Smith
Reviews.Content: I like the Toshiba laptop very much.  No problems.  It arrived in good time with no difficulties. So far it is just as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Luv my new laptop
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: I purchased my laptop in June of 2011. So far I am very pleased. The keystrokes are smooth and not too sensitive.  This is the first time I have ever used a Toshiba. I am able to navigate just fine. I don't have a lot of information or opinions to give at this time because I purchased this computer for school specifically and I will have a better idea once school has begun.  I can say that I chose this particular laptop because it was listed number one on the top ten laptops under $500.00.  So far I have not been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great all around, except for one thing..
Reviews.Author: Eric Sink
Reviews.Content: This Computer is terrific! Not to mention great price! I comparison shopped for a bit and found this to be the best deal. Amazon usually is. everything works like a dream except one little thing. It only comes with 2 USB ports which wouldn't be a problem if they actually worked. After about 5 months of use the USB ports will now only work on occasion. If u want this for your iPod it certainly has the memory, or if you like to use a mouse, either way go and get this computer, just be gentle with the USB ports and if something happens take it to Geek Squad or somehwere and have them take a look at it. Good Luck!

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Laptop
Reviews.Author: Raji
Reviews.Content: My grandson had bought the same laptop last year; and said that he was very pleased with the laptop.  When I decided to buy a second laptop, I went for the same.  I have had another Toshiba Laptop, Satellite, for last about five years.  I think Toshiba makes pretty reliable machines.  One thing I'd have preferred is to get the CD or DVD, for the "System Recovery"; which would be a great help for not-so-technically oriented users!!!  I have not used this new laptop for more than a few days, so can not honestly comment on it.  Hopefully will give me good service for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Beatrice Miller
Reviews.Content: I had a Toshiba Satellite before and loved it, so when it was time for a new one I wanted another Toshiba.This one was very affordable and I Love it as much as I did my last, great deal !!Highly recomment it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice FOr Me!
Reviews.Author: Helen C. Stone "Creative Buyer"
Reviews.Content: I have been very pleased with the purchase of this Toshiba Satellite L655-S5158.  It is exactly what I needed for teaching and school.  The full-sized keypad makes the grade book simple.  I cannot complain about anything!  The graphics, sound and video are perfect!  Thank you for making my life easier!

Reviews.Title: So far it is Ok, but....
Reviews.Author: Bargas
Reviews.Content: Computer is as expected and much faster that my old Toshiba (specially while browsing the net on wifi)I have been using it for almost 3 weeks and started noticing that it hangs more and more oftenHope this doesn't become a regular issue, otherwise I am screwed

Reviews.Title: Laptop review
Reviews.Author: beach bum
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a very resonably priced laptop for personal or small business use then this is the one for you.  Have owned it for about a month and is used every day.  Good battery life (about 4-5 hours) depending on how much you have going on in the background. Lightweight.  Quick and responsive.  Good screen size.  Go get you one.

Reviews.Title: usb ports doesnt work
Reviews.Author: Zhenya
Reviews.Content: after  1 week of purchase i noticed that i have a problem with a usb ports. i installed all needed drivers but it was still not working and i returned it back.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Laptop
Reviews.Author: sulalpm
Reviews.Content: This was my first laptop purchase from Amazon and i am satisfied with the lap. The lap contains all the features it offered and i didnt find any issues so far. The product is working fine and yet to explore in detail.

Reviews.Title: I dig this unit!
Reviews.Author: The Kman "Aloha!"
Reviews.Content: Totally happy with the price-point-based laptop. I bought it basically to be a large-capacity iPod. I have a huge music collection and want to be able to DJ all my tunes while camping (bought extended battery and dc adapter) and beyond holding all 46000 tunes, I've been writing for my website and enjoying all the other conveniences of a laptop. One great convenience is sitting on my back lanai (veranda/porch) on hot evenings networked to my Netflix to watch a movie, or enjoy surfing the Net wirelessly.Sure, it's only an I3, but does EVERYTHING I ask of it...and know it's limits.

Reviews.Title: Lovin most of it
Reviews.Author: Cherylsaurus
Reviews.Content: Ive had this laptop for a month and its working amazingly, It has alot of battery life on its eco mode for web browsing or simple things like working on documents.the only thing that is horrible on the device are the speakers... which make a scratching sound due to probably loose plastic around the speakers. its a minor problem and the scratching goes away if u place a slightly heavy object or gently hold the speaker area. other than this, i love it

Reviews.Title: I'm lovin' it
Reviews.Author: Schlev
Reviews.Content: Good computer, love the key pad on the right. Speakers are just ok but I've had worse. Quick, skype camera is cool and convenient. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite L655-S5158
Reviews.Author: Long Dang Ho
Reviews.Content: This laptop is great for the price that I paid.  The battery does not last as long as it was noted.

Reviews.Title: An honest review!
Reviews.Author: pjspelce
Reviews.Content: So I've been laptop searching for a long time now, and when I saw the value on this laptop, I became anxious. I thought, "how could this laptop be so cheap, yet offer one of the highest values on the market?"My good impressions:1. Very clean Windows 7 operating system2. SUPER fast Intel i3 processor3. Extremely fast start-up and installation4. Great 10-key keypad5. Nice, bright screen6. The built in card reader for fast uploading of photos7. The frequency of updatesMy bad, yet understandable impressions:1. Speakers are full blown crap. To elaborate, I actually had to go to Toshiba's website and update the sound drive because I "blew out" my speakers the first week.2. The inability to play 720p YouTube videos. I can barely play 480p...(and I have excellent internet connection)3. The battery life is absolutely horrendous. I can go maybe 45 minutes and then it shuts off....BUT, I can't complain because I got a great deal out of this laptop!

Reviews.Title: Good performance an a affordable price
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The Toshiba Satellite L655-S5158 is a solid built notebook, with a very clear display and really good performance for a notebook in this price range. One thing I particulary liked was that this notebook, unlike similar ones from other brands, has a full sized and confortable keyboard, since I do a lot of writing both on my desktop computer and on my notebook this is a great feature for me.Overall this notebook has everything I've been looking for, solid performance, a good graphic chip, nice sound, and a very fast memory; and at the price it is currently selling on Amazon you can't afford to miss it.

Reviews.Title: FAST & FRIENDLY
Reviews.Author: TIP W.
Reviews.Content: PROS - Very fast right out of the box. Nice enhancements - easy button to engage or disengage touchpad, lighted CAPS button, and separate numerical keypad. Would recommend to a friend. Runs very cool - no need for an extra fan.CONS - Disappointed that it wasn't offerred with choice of 32 or 64 bit windows. Unable to use some older favorite programs.TIP W.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy For The Money
Reviews.Author: JohnandJen
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase! There is not a part of this laptop that I can complain about!

Reviews.Title: QUALITY PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: FRANK JONES
Reviews.Content: This is our third Toshiba laptop, and i have to say, this is our favorite unit. it's fast, has a great display, and is loaded with features - 4 gb ram, 640 hard drive, labelflash. i was a little leery about this machine initially - it had garnered a few black marks for fan noise and speaker quality. Our fan is very quiet, but we do use a Logitech cooling pad that keeps things nice and frigid. The speakers sound fine. i like the i3 processor -  it's great for multi-tasking. the fusion finish is classy, even if it is a fingerprint magnet. For $480, it's an unbeatable bargain! get one, you'll be glad you did!

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Spencer
Reviews.Content: While not a processing powerhouse, it is a serviceable, market-standard PC that gets the job done with a sleek looking chassis.

Reviews.Title: Great, Reliable Laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: Behn Trader
Reviews.Content: I've had this laptop for over a month now.  I can't find too many weaknesses, if any.  It's a good laptop for getting grad school work done, surfing the web, skyping, and watching movies.  I did the research on this one and Toshibas are the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Robust laptop, great price
Reviews.Author: Douglas Schores "Traveler"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this laptop for my wife as her old one stopped connecting via wifi to the web and the battery finally gave out.  This laptop had all of the features she needed and then some with a very large hard drive, more than adequate RAM, a DVD writer, etc.  The webcam was not needed as we use another computer to connect with Skype, but this gives us flexibility.We had looked at other brands, but the last two computers we had, a Dell and an HP, both crashed and lost their hard drives in a relatively short time.  While under warranty, it was still a time-consuming task to reload the programs and the files, which fortunately we always back up.  The Toshiba comes highly ranked via Consumer Reports and our daughter had one that lasted throughout college and beyond.We think this purchase was ideal for our needs and came with a very attractive price.

Reviews.Title: faster but has terrible speakers
Reviews.Author: Amerizoi "Amerizoi"
Reviews.Content: As others has mentioned the speakers are horrible, good size screen very clear image.  The glide pad will take sometime to get used to.  I have only had it a few hours so I will update the review after a few days of use.

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD FOR SKYPE USE
Reviews.Author: MARIA
Reviews.Content: Depends on what you use your laptop for but this laptop doesn't do justice if you use it for Skype...you have to be in a very bright room for the other party to see you or you need a lamp right in front of you to brighten your face for the other party to see you clearly. This doesn't have good speakers, either, when you're watching a movie, even if you maximize all controls for volume,(unless you don't mind investing in external speakers)...and sometimes it just hangs up on you or freezes when writing something, and as the other review said , the page just jumps up or down when you're scrolling down a page...really annoying...so definitely ,despite the hassles of returning, this laptop is going back to Amazon...

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Allan V. Luster "Allan"
Reviews.Content: This is my first laptop ever, so I have nothing to compare it to except for my desktop computer. I bought this Toshiba partly as a travelling computer and partly as a back-up for the desktop. Since I rarely do any travelling, it has been sitting on a desk since I received it. I am writing this review, which is completely uninformative, because I do appreciate all the reviews others have written on this and all the other products available on Amazon. I do like the aesthetics of the machine very much, and the price was very good at $479.00.

Reviews.Title: Good computer for the price
Reviews.Author: RT
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time (even earlier). This is my second Toshiba Satellite (I bought 1 for my brother 5 month ago: it works great).It's fast, nice and cheap (I was lucky: bought it just for $479.99).Actually it has 582 Gb hard drive, battery lasts just for 4 hours.Overall it's good computer for the price.

Reviews.Title: Lucky man...
Reviews.Author: Anil
Reviews.Content: I think I was pretty luck buying this computer at the launch price of $479.I've had it for several months now and no problems.  Keyboard is great as is the build quality, speed fine for everything save high-end games.Not sure what the price is now, but that's key given the competition with HP etc

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: ayman
Reviews.Content: go for it ,do not listen to the drawbacks of this laptop , if any problem happened it is just the software otherwise everything works for me , it is really good piece and the price is wonderful.one more thing it is intel I core 3 processor ,you know what I am talking about?

Reviews.Title: My first laptop
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Leedy
Reviews.Content: I bought my Toshiba about 6 months ago. It was very easy to set up, just plug it in, turn it on, and go.  It's fast, and I've never had any problems with it.  The only complaint I have is that the sound isn't very loud without speakers.  I have had it all the way up and still have to lean in pretty close to hear it if there are other sounds going on around me.  I haven't bought the speakers yet, but I'm sure they will fix that problem.

Reviews.Title: Great price equals pure crap!
Reviews.Author: Abby Canada "mom2miraclez"
Reviews.Content: My husband purchase this particular laptop for me as a Val's gift. In the beginning, I was very satisfied with it.. idiot proof.. at the time, the only bad thing I could really say was the volume on it sucked, but no biggie...In 8 months, the plug in area for my charger started messing up. My husband, being the computer engineer, popped the corner and found out that the receptor was plastic and slightly warped from use so he just put a small piece of card board and all was well...About 6 months later, I noticed that the left button on the mouse pad seem to be really "clicky".. and just thought that was just typical wear and tear.. When my son played a game on facebook and was clicking (farmville) the left button half way popped out.. not thinking, he just popped it back in.. and it continued to work like normal.. thought nothing of it.The next day, I opened my laptop to a black screen. Nothing came on.. wouldn't boot up or anything.. took battery out..etc.. Hubby took it apart.. WHAT COMPANY THAT MAKES LAPTOPS PUTS THE MOTHERBOARD BELOW THE MOUSEPAD WITH *NO* PADDING?????????  all the parts inside was ALL PLASTIC!  THERE WAS NO BARRIER BETWEEN THE MOUSE PAD/LEFT/RIGHT CLICK BUTTONS AND THE MOTHERBOARD!CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP!!

Reviews.Title: Kind of let down
Reviews.Author: jandjj
Reviews.Content: I've owned several Toshibas and hoped this one would be okay for me.  I don't know if it's a logical sentiment, but I was a bit worried that this line was rolled out for Amazon only and there was basically no information on it outside of Amazon.  (Let me state that I adore Amazon and shop here almost daily.  It wasn't the business that made me nervous, so much as the singularity.)I'll be quick so as not to create an echo chamber.  Out of the box, I was excited with the machine.  Slim, sleek, no blinding white lights or movie buttons.  Score!  It booted fast.  I tested the speakers...they were standard laptop ilk, slightly tinny. I'm used to harmon/kardon speakers so I knew this laptop wasn't for me.It would be for my son instead.  We pulled up the pre-installed Chrome.  Crash.  Only internet explorer worked.  We reinstalled chrome, failed, failed, finally installed, wouldn't load.  We installed Safari.  It appeared to be there but would not load.  Finally, IE started freezing any time you attempted to open a new tab, finally freezing completely.  But the biggest problem was random shut-downs.  Boom, off.So, my son ordered a Lenovo instead, and I ordered a different, slightly pricier Satellite.  All that's to say I still have faith in Toshiba.  One is running next to me as my little boy plays Wiz101 with total quality.  I think this model just might have a couple of bad eggs, but if you happen to score a good one, you're set.Also, Amazon's return procedure was flawless as always.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba warranties are worthless - cooling systems are faulty
Reviews.Author: Exercisemaniac "bascelflt"
Reviews.Content: We will never purchase a Toshiba laptop after our Satellite A665 was returned NOT fixed.  They "cleaned" it and "ran a diagnostic" but obvious never just turned it on because as soon as it was returned and we plugged it in the warning about the cooling system came on immediately.  OF course, by the time the shipping box was sent to us, the computer sent to the repair depot in TX and it was returned then the computer was out of warranty and still NOT fixed.  The customer service people would not listen (what language do they speak as a native tongue?)  Other repair people are stating that Toshiba's are known for faulty cooling systems although most of the computer is well made the cooling system is a common problem.  This was a warranty problem and NOT fixed. What recourse does one have when speaking with people who may sound like they speak English but don't truly understand what you are saying????

Reviews.Title: dont do it!
Reviews.Author: D. White
Reviews.Content: hard drive problems within 6 months.  Waste of time and money.  Last toshiba product (with the possible exception of toilet paper)I'll buy.  Feel free to check my other reviews.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENT PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: darce276
Reviews.Content: The computer arrived in perfect condition, its an excelent computer for such a low price! I really recommend you this laptop!

Reviews.Title: excelent price - performance - capabilities
Reviews.Author: Pablo
Reviews.Content: The price vs all the features and performance this computer has, it just amazing, data card reader, dvd burner, nice screen. I love it .

Reviews.Title: beware the hard drive in this machine
Reviews.Author: Ezenwa Egwuatu
Reviews.Content: i bought the first one and less than a month the hard drive crashed, i love this laptop so i had it exchanged for the exact same model, 2 months in and now this one is giving me signs that the hard drive is crashing, i backed up all my data and i'm patiently waiting to see what happens.i think this model series has a general problem with the hard drive they come with. i'm thinkin of buying my own hard drive and taking out the factory one in it

Reviews.Title: hot and noisy
Reviews.Author: J. Zhang
Reviews.Content: I bot this computer and used for a few month. At first it worked fine.Recently, it starts frozen at first  I thought a software issue. Reinstalled the system and not much improvement. Finally figure out it is due to over heating. The fan runs and the air is hot(60C by thermalmeter). Things getting worse, and my friend suggested that this model was not made with high quality and the heat sinker core could loose overtime. He opened the box and applied some glue. No more frozon but the fan is till running crazy and the outlet of air is hot.I sold the laptop at $150 at Craiglist last week (stated the issue).Will not buy this class of toshiba machines again.

Reviews.Title: Video Card Defective
Reviews.Author: AccioFirebolt
Reviews.Content: Battery life is terrible. Every time I try to watch a movie on it it freezes up and I have to restart the computer by unplugging cord and taking out battery. Love the design and full keyboard. I would recommend buying an HP.Just an update. I ended up returning this to Amazon and purchased a Xoom from Best Buy and last week an HP laptop from Amazon. The reason I am updating is because I took the computer to a professional and he said the video card had gone out on it. Problem is, I had only had it for two months. I will never buy another Toshiba. Terrible experience and I had to go without a laptop while I replaced the defective one.

Reviews.Title: Do NOt Buy TOshiba
Reviews.Author: Mike O'Neill
Reviews.Content: I bought a Toshiba and it has been a BIG disaapointment.  Within 60 Days both the webcam stopped working and the speakers are of low quality.  When I went to their website I could find no support numbers and that the webcam is a common issue with many models.'Buy anything except Toshiba

Reviews.Title: mentira lo de las 650GB
Reviews.Author: otto
Reviews.Content: la compu esta super linda util y todo pero t meineten con respecto a q tiene 650 GB xq la mia solo traia 580 maximo, pero por el resto todo esta super bien...
